Backups

Your Enterprise cloud data is backed up continuously and retained for 30 days. Within those 30 days we can restore your data to any point in time with a precision of 5 minutes, in case you need us to.

Download

For the time being you cannot download backups yourself. You will have to get in touch with us. We can then provide a current or past backup (database + attachments) to you.

This way you can also get your data if you decide to stop using the Enterprise cloud edition.
